Method Detail

animateTrain

public void animateTrain(int numUnits,
                         int numMoves)
Repeatedly moves the train numUnits to the right (except the smoke) by numMoves number of times. The smoke, however moves separately as follows: Every move the train makes, the smoke moves 5 units backwards and 10 units up, and its diameter increases by 3. However at every sixth move, the smoke is reset to its initial size and position above the funnel.

moveTrainBy

public void moveTrainBy(int numUnits)
Moves each component of the receiver Train object (except the smoke) by numUnits to the right

run

public void run()
Gets the number of units for each move from the user, then the method gets the number of moves from the user. If (number of units * number of moves) is more than the guestimated width of the maximised Shapes window, the user is told that the train will not run and the method ends. Otherwise the train moves as required.
